text: Splitting a string via regex problems
New to python and I'm having trouble getting the function i want out of regex.
Basically i have a string that looks like "Hello,   World,  Nice" and i need to convert it into a list with the delimiter being ,.

Basically the result i get is 
['Hello', '  World', '  Nice'].
I know a solution via a different method but i'd like to uses regex.
